lead_paragraph: Russian doping whistleblower Yulia Stepanova and her husband said on Monday they would not accept an International Olympic Committee (IOC) invitation to attend the Rio Games as spectators.

headline.print_headline: Stepanovs Decline Games Invitation as Spectators
headline.main: Stepanovs Decline Games Invitation as Spectators
